com.autonomy.aci.client.transport.AciHttpClient

  • Packages that use AciHttpClient 
    Package Description
    com.autonomy.aci.client.services.impl
    Core implementation of the AciService interface.
    com.autonomy.aci.client.transport.gss
    Extensions to the core implementation to allow communication with ACI servers using GSS-API.
    com.autonomy.aci.client.transport.impl
    Core implementation of the AciHttpClient interface.
